AD_HouseOfHealing_Gravestone19_0.speaker: Narrator
AD_HouseOfHealing_Gravestone19_0.text: *Here rests Violet Goldhammer, beloved singer. May her voice live on in our memories.*
AD_HouseOfHealing_Gravestone19_0.context: NodeContext: Name only features on this tombstone - pronunciation can be whatever feels natural.

AD_HouseOfHealing_Gravestone41_0.speaker: Narrator

AD_HouseOfHealing_Gravestone5_0.speaker: Narrator
